sentences.en: Dickens had humorously suggested a special service of intercession at St. Paul's cathedral.
sentences.cn: 狄更斯幽默地建议在圣保罗大教堂提供一种特殊服务——代祷.

sentences.en: He answered humorously, "The UFO has diplomatic immunity.
sentences.cn: 他幽默地回答说："UFO有外交豁免权。"

sentences.en: He looked at me humorously as he wrestled with the door.
sentences.cn: 他一边和那扇门较着劲，一边表情滑稽地看着我。

sentences.en: He said humorously, your snow andcould never be changed.
sentences.cn: “白发三千丈, 缘悉似个长”,大诗人李白不是早就这样感叹过吗?

sentences.en: Kratos is released from Atlas'grasp as the Titan laughs humorously.
sentences.cn: 泰坦松开捏住奎托斯的手指,幽默地笑起来.

sentences.en: Occasionally he made a humorously sardonic remark.
sentences.cn: 他时不时说一句幽默嘲讽的话。
他们只得幽默地耸耸肩.

sentences.en: This crazy, satirical epic full of horrifying iron humorously portrays several eras in European history.
sentences.cn: 这一疯狂而讽刺的历史题材作品中充满可怖的铁器,幽默地描绘了欧洲几个时代的历史图景.

sentences.en: Which female character's speech is full of humorously misused words?
sentences.cn: 那一位女性人物的讲话误用充满滑稽的词语?

words.tran_cn: 非常严肃的；缺少幽默感的
诙谐的，幽默的；滑稽的，可笑的
缺乏幽默感的；一本正经的
缺乏幽默感地；一本正经地
幽默作家；富于幽默感的人
